snippet: The wryly named iShack, or “improved shack,” a prototype built by a group of South African researchers, is part of a project to help those living in the proliferating clusters of shacks outside Cape Town by providing solar panels and...
abstract: The wryly named iShack, or “improved shack,” a prototype built by a group of South African researchers, is part of a project to help those living in the proliferating clusters of shacks outside Cape Town by providing solar panels and energy-saving features to make them more livable.
lead_paragraph: The wryly named iShack, or “improved shack,” a prototype built by a group of South African researchers, is part of a project to help those living in the proliferating clusters of shacks outside Cape Town by providing solar panels and energy-saving features to make them more livable.

headline.main: South African Settlement Welcomes the iShack
